data.text: @mattlargey What are you doing so wrong?  Austin is always having to check in to a hospital.  Everyone else is doing what they are supposed to do.

@alex_wykoff @mattlargey Omicron BA.2 is a variant of concern. Numbers in the East are rising. NZ's numbers are shooting up too. Experts I follow say no global vaccine equity = always the risk of a new, badder variant, eventually. I will personally be masking up as I want nothing to do with Long Covid.
@mattlargey So no more scariants? Did we even measure omicron vs a normal flu season in terms of hospitalizations and deaths or nah?
@mattlargey Are there any more rising variants of interest or are we finally getting out of this mess? https://t.co/Y1TbonPf1Z

@mattlargey These COVID stages use several metrics & referring to a single metric as being in a different stage sends a confusing message. Like saying a flight from Calgary to Winnipeg has crossed the same longitude as Austin. We all should be wearing masks, even if vaxed or outdoors.
